name: REQUEST FOR REGIONAL ANESTHESIA BLOCK
comments: If clinically applicable, anesthesia team to consider a post-operative pain block in the perioperative setting.

comments: Use soap and water or rinse free body bath with washcloth to cleanse the face and ears.
